website_summaries.verdict: Earns top marks for versatility and superior craftsmanship. If you want the best hose reel money can buy, look no further.
pros: Made of solid steel with rugged components capable of handling 200 feet of garden and industrial hoses
Features a well-built hand crank that operates smoothly and a rugged A-frame that holds the reel securely in place
cons: It's the most expensive model on our list
It's also heavy and takes up significant space, but if you are looking for a hose reel that's constructed to last, no other will do

customer_reviews.title: Unusable for regular garden hose
customer_reviews.text: Had to return at hefty shipping cost. It is primarily for pressurd hoses and not regular garddn hose dven with adaptor. Not accurately piteayed in description
customer_reviews.author: M M Hadcock

customer_reviews.title: Pictures very misleading, seems decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Decently built reel, poor item description. There's no effective dimensions in the descriptions so I assumed the images were correct. Well, when my 3/4-250ft reel showed up, it's about the diameter I expected, but its twice as wide as the proportion of the pictures, literally its like 2 reels together end to end (but it's a single piece drum with 2 end plates). Hopefully it'll fit where I plan to attach it on a 500gal water trailer.
customer_reviews.author: racer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Life is now good! No more winding 200ft of hose when I wash houses!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Reel
customer_reviews.text: I own a very nice pressure washing business! Coxreels hasn’t failed me yet and the reels are nice and solid. I’ve chosen the 325ft hose reels to allow me to upgrade more hose if ever needed. Even though these aren’t stainless steel, the old saying, if you take care of what you have it will take care of you!
customer_reviews.author: FitToFight

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Used to run water hose out to dock. Sits out in weather and after 2 months is none worse for the wear, but has only been two months. Have another Cox real just like this one only little bigger that I use to run the electricity out to the dock and it has been out in weather for past 2 years and still looks like new (after the dust is washed off). Works well for both purposes and is definitely a quality item. A little pricey but worth the bucks and I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: The reel is a great piece but the description is misleading. (1" Hose ID, 100' Length) if you read this in description you would think the reel came with 100' of 1'' hose. I reported this to Amazon and received many apologies which is all fine and dandy but I see that the ad still reads the same so they can confuse the next customer that wants a reel and hose assembly only to their surprise when they open the box they fine a missing hose and then the new customer has to waste time trying to fine out where hose is, which also is complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Helmet

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I've got a 1125-4-200 and a 1125-5-100 mounted on a plastic pallet in the bed of my F150 to do house washes. I have 200 ft of 3/8 high pressure hose and 100 ft of 3/4 garden hose mounted on these reels. These reels have made my side hustle so much easier! No more unraveling and rolling up hose on the ground! I simply roll up the tonneau, pull hose and get to washing.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Reel was off-centered upon arrival. The bearings had been pushed 1” out of alignment so that the reel couldn’t spin freely. The holding pin couldn’t release either. The fittings began to rust after a few weeks. The handle is flimsy and bends easily. For how costly this item is, I would never recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Leif Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised! The pictures do not do justice. This thing is heavy gauge and well built. Looks great too. I was impressed by the quality as soon as I removed it from the box. I will be using this commercially in my pressure wash business, so I can't wait to see how it holds up over the long haul. And it's Made In America! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: This reel will never need to be replaced!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Bought it to roll up garden hoses after watering the yard. Capacity seems to be under estimated. Literature indicates it will hold 250 feet of 3/4 inch ID garden hose. I put 250 feet of 3/4 inch hose on it and it was about half full. I think it will hold at least another 250 feet. Its a big joker. Should easily last a homeowner a lifetime. Very good powder coat paint.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: reel lock was 1/2 short of locking reel
customer_reviews.text: not sure how this reel ever made it out of the factory, but the spring loaded reel lock was 1/2"short of even getting to the hole on the side of the reel to lock it.. need better QC
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great USA-made hose reel for a wildland fire fighting vehicle
customer_reviews.text: This hose reel is mounted on a restored USMC Humvee used for rural wildfire fighting. It's sturdy and well made, and should last for many years of seasonal use. Made in the USA too!
customer_reviews.author: Blaine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice reel  it took 3 weeks to get
customer_reviews.text: Very nice reel it is a lot longer then the picture looks well build I had to order the smaller one
customer_reviews.author: jeffry alan bender

customer_reviews.title: Not like the plastic hose reels the sell at your local ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty steel constructed. Not like the plastic hose reels the sell at your local big box hardware stores. Works awesome, the hose reel is supported by two heavy duty roller bearings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Built very solid. Easy to set up and use. Looks like something that will last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Gunnells

customer_reviews.title: Came. A day early made it even better. Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: I am useing this. For my power washer trailer. For the Pressure hose I put 200 foot of hose on here no problems it is everything they said it was I’m very happy and pleased with it. I highly recommend it no issues what so. Ever. Worth every penny Gallo disposal co

customer_reviews.title: Swivel needs to be stainless steel with better seals
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 4 months and the swivel has sprung u leak and a new one is 65$
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Fittings
customer_reviews.text: Instructions say: Thread male hose fitting into outlet riser(s) {Refer to FIGURE 1 .0). No mention that both the inlet and outlet require a 3/4" NPT to hose adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Casper

customer_reviews.title: Broken Swivel
customer_reviews.text: had my reel for 8 months and the reel swivel broke. this reel was never dropped or hit, the swivel broke from the inside and must have been a factory flaw. Very disappointed that I have to repair with less than a year in service.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E Bryant Jr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It's a little wider than I expected so you need a good footprint area for it
customer_reviews.author: Aritt Davis

customer_reviews.title: part number wrong
customer_reviews.text: The reel I got is only 6in wide and will only hold 50' of 1/2 in air hose the part number is right but wrong reel!
customer_reviews.author: allison w. hall

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and I use this to fill my buffer tank.
customer_reviews.author: JD Hall

customer_reviews.title: couldn't be happier! Only wish they sold the reels and attachments ...
customer_reviews.text: Gr8 quality, gr8 product, couldn't be happier! Only wish they sold the reels and attachments for hoses together as a combo package...
customer_reviews.author: andrew graham

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it, it's the bollocks.
customer_reviews.text: Good old fashioned quality. Solid, well designed, built like a warship.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simply fantastic, quality materials fabricated to high standards. Just what we have been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rosen

customer_reviews.title: High quality hose reel.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Sturdy, smooth and easy to mount with the bottom rails.
customer_reviews.author: Duane C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well constructed. Use it for oil applications on our forms. Have 4 of them and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product for the money . long lasting in all weather conditions .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice item. Works great im happy with this. I would recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo ortega

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Hosereel, it is made to Industrial Standards
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Hosereel, it is made to Industrial Standards, it is well engineered and very robust. It is more expensive than domestic hose reels but well worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mr P L Young

product_meta.title: Coxreels 1125-4-200 Steel Hand Crank Hose Reel, 1/2" Hose I.D., 200' Hose Capacity, 3,000 PSI, without Hose, Made in USA
product_meta.description: Size:1/2" x 200'This Coxreels 1125 Series hose reel is designed for air, water, oil, or pressure washer applications and is manual rewind by hand crank action. The reel can be mounted to a floor, wall, ceiling, bench, or truck. It has a steel A-frame construction for strength and durability and 2-point axle support for stability during operation. Professional grade, heavy duty steel construction coated with a durable proprietary CPC Powder Coat Process. Rolled edges and ribbed discs for strength and safety. It has a brake assembly for braking or for locking the drum to a desired length of hose. It has a working pressure of 3,000 pounds per square inch (psi) and a maximum temperature rating of 275 degrees F. This hose reel is suitable for use in lawn care, grounds maintenance, pressure washing, steam cleaning, washdown, and fire protection applications. Leading 2-Year Manufacturer's Limited Warranty. Made In The U.S.A. Coxreels manufactures hose, cord, and cable reels and accessories. The company, founded in 1923, is headquartered in Tempe, AZ. NOTE: Includes Coxreels Hose Reel ONLY; no hose, fittings, roller guides, etc. Click on the Coxreels link above the product title to visit the Coxreels brand page to see more quality products from Coxreels.
feature_bullets: PREFERRED DESIGN: Featuring our professional grade one piece all CNC robotically welded 12 Gage steel A frame construction for superior reel structure. Exclusive low profile outlet riser and open drum slot design provide a non-crimping, flat smooth hose.

DURABILITY: Engineered to last our permanently lubricated self-aligning pillow block bearings take the wear, stress and heat out for a smooth rotation. Featuring a solid brass full-flow NPT swivel, our hand reel makes simple seal maintenance a breeze.

COMFORTABLE CONTROL: Complete with a tension break, you can adjust the control of your draw! This helps prevent the hose holder from free-wheeling during operation, storage, and transport, while the direct hand crank makes retraction quick and easy.

MADE IN THE USA: Great for industrial settings, finished with a powder coat, long-lasting and resistant to chips and rusting. The CNC-spun discs are ribbed with rolled edges, resulting in greater strength, superior hose protection, and operator safety.

SHOP RISK-FREE: A limited 2-year manufacturer’s warranty, and over 90 years of experience, our hose roller delivers quality you can trust! Download installation, maintenance, and warranty information in the downloads under the product image to the left.
